title: The HOODLUM Interview: Texas Upbringing, Lean, Selling His Own Orange Juice & More
description:
Hoodlum chose No Jumper for his first interview! Straight from San Antonio, he talks about his come up, being independent, staying consistent, relationship with Maxo Kream and more! https://www.instagram.com/southsideho... ----- NO JUMPER PATREON http://www.patreon.com/nojumper CHECK OUT OUR NEW SPOTIFY PLAYLIST https://open.spotify.com/playlist/5te... FOLLOW US ON SNAPCHAT FOR THE LATEST NEWS & UPDATES https://www.snapchat.com/discover/No_...
